txt.en: Climb the hill to try to see if you can spot the hobbits from above
You have come to the banks of the Entwash
Found a hobbit-footprint in the mud
It looks like a pair of hobbits may have paused here to wash their cares away in the clear water
Ashlimb has spotted two young hobbits whom you know to be Merry and Pippin of the Shire, friends you have met on your travels.
This footprint points away from the river now, following a low path through the wood
You find some crumbs. Only a hobbit could stop for a nibble upon the discovery of such a strange hill. Surely they climbed this....

This tree-ish Ent has decided that he is curious about the creatures he saw -- hobbits whom you know to be Meriadoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took of the Shire. Ashlimb's inquisitive gaze speaks plainly: he wishes to know whither these hobbits have gone, and what fate they have met. Are they safe?\n\nYou find yourself wondering the same thing.
The hobbits walked south-west, towards where they believed the Entwash to be.\n\nYou should try to find the Entwash and search for signs of the two lost halflings.

'Well met, [placeholder]. This would be a surprising meeting, if I had not known that you would appear at this very spot around this very time.\n\n'Come, let us speak at some length. Do make yourself comfortable!'
Signs of the hobbits' passage may be found along the Entwash heading north-west, deeper into the forest.\n\nYou should search for signs of the two lost halflings.
The hobbits walked north along the Entwash.\n\nYou should search for signs of the two lost halflings.
The hobbits veered north-east on the path running alongside the Entwash.\n\nYou should search for signs of the two lost halflings.
You have followed the hobbits to a strange hill in Fangorn that promises an overlook above the treetops.
Find the Entwash and search for signs of the hobbits' passage
Find a sign of Merry and Pippin's passage
Find a sign of Merry and Pippin's passage
Follow the path through the forest to search for signs of Merry and Pippin
Tracking Some Hobbits
Climb the hill to try to see if you can spot the hobbits from above
